Title: 017: Partitioning, Roles in Database Infrastructure and SQL Databases with Colin Sloss
Description:
In this episode of the Super Data Science Podcast, I chat with Data Engineer Colin Sloss. You will know about horizontal partitioning at Skype, discover the different roles in database infrastructure and learn the different types of SQL database.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/17
